sentence.Network_en: a hitherto unknown species of moth
sentence.Network_cn: 迄今仍属未知种类的蛾

sentence.Network_en: Hitherto he had experienced no great success in his attempt.
sentence.Network_cn: 到目前为止,他的尝试还没获得成功.

sentence.Network_en: The polytechnics have hitherto been at an unfair disadvantage in competing for pupils and money.
sentence.Network_cn: 到目前为止，理工专科学校在争取生源和资金方面一直处于劣势。

list.abs: Basement living hitherto been damp , dark and miserable , suited only to depressed students ., 地下室的生活至今仍给人潮湿 , 阴暗和糟糕的印象 , 只适合穷困潦倒的学生.
For the first time criticism was directed at a hitherto untouchable target ., 批评首次指向了一个至今不可触及的对象.
However , another fascinating question , hitherto absent from the current palaver , may prove more tractable ., 然而 , 另外一个有趣 , 然而一直未有实质进展的问题可能更好回答一些.
多音字unknown的汉英词典搜索结果，... ... 陌生 unfamiliar 前所未有 unprecedented;hitherto unknown 详细 Persons Unknown New.
this is a fact hitherto unknown ., 这是一个至今无人知道的事实.

entry.def: You use hitherto to indicate that something was true up until the time you are talking about, although it may no longer be the case.

example.ex: The polytechnics have hitherto been at an unfair disadvantage in competing for pupils and money...
example.tran: 到目前为止，理工专科学校在争取生源和资金方面一直处于劣势。

example.ex: Hitherto, the main emphasis has been on the need to resist aggression...
example.tran: 迄今为止，一直重点强调的是要抵抗侵略。

means.word_mean: 1. used in negative statement to describe a situation that has existed up to this point or up to the present time;

auth_sentence.content: Its hitherto strong post-fascist political settlement is rapidly weakening.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its hitherto strong post-fascist political settlement is rapidly weakening.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its hitherto strong post-fascist political settlement is rapidly weakening.

auth_sentence.content: But these early people have hitherto been remarkably elusive.
auth_sentence.res_content: But these early people have hitherto been remarkably elusive.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But these early people have hitherto been remarkably elusive.

auth_sentence.content: Zurab Noghaideli, hitherto finance minister, becomes premier.
auth_sentence.res_content: Zurab Noghaideli, hitherto finance minister, becomes premier.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Zurab Noghaideli, hitherto finance minister, becomes premier.

sentences.en: Hitherto he had experienced no great success in his attempt.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止, 他的尝试还没获得成功。

jushi.english: I have mastered about 10000 English words hitherto.
jushi.chinese: 迄今为止我已经掌握了大约10000个英语单词。
